definition: to suspend/to hang up/to hang a person
thick pole/bar/rod/thick line/to mark with a thick line/to sharpen (knife)/(old) coffin-bearing pole

sentences.english: What's the safe working load of each derrick?
sentences.chinese: 每根吊槓的安全工作負荷是多少？

sentences.english: When you grab the new trapeze, personal growth is over.
sentences.chinese: 當你抓到新吊槓的那一瞬，成長也就結束了。

sentences.english: My younger daughter is a trapeze artist.
sentences.chinese: 我小女兒是一名吊槓演員。
